name: Pomelo Fashion Company Ltd
description: Operator of an online e-commerce marketplace intended to offer fashion clothes and accessories. The company's marketplace offers clothes, shoes, and accessories for the fashion-forward consumer and works with designers to create house brand products, enabling consumers to bring more statements into their style.
one_liner: Operator of an online e-commerce marketplace intended to offer fashion clothes and accessories. The company's marketplace offers clothes, shoes, and accessories for the fashion-forward consumer and works with designers to create house brand products, enabling consumers to bring more statements into their style.
